verses.verse: (For the choir director. [A Psalm] of David the servant of the Lord.) <S%H6588>Transgression<s%> <S%H5002>speaks<s%> to the <S%H7563>ungodly<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> his <S%H3820>heart;<s%> <S%H369>There<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H6343>fear<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
For it <S%H9140>flatters<s%> him in his [own] <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> Concerning the <S%H4672>discovery<s%> of his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> [and] the <S%H8130>hatred<s%> [of it.]
The <S%H1697>words<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> are <S%H205>wickedness<s%> and <S%H4820>deceit;<s%> He has <S%H2308>ceased<s%> to be <S%H7919>wise<s%> [and] to <S%H3190>do<s%> <S%H3190>good.<s%>

He <S%H2803>plans<s%> <S%H205>wickedness<s%> upon his <S%H4904>bed;<s%> He <S%H3320>sets<s%> himself on a <S%H1870>path<s%> that is not <S%H2896>good;<s%> He does not <S%H3988>despise<s%> <S%H9563>evil.<s%>
Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> extends to the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> Thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> [reaches] to the <S%H7834>skies.<s%>

Thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> is like the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H410>God;<s%> Thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are [like] a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H8415>deep.<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Thou <S%H3467>preservest<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast.<s%>

<S%H4100>How<s%> <S%H3368>precious<s%> is Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness,<s%> O <S%H430>God!<s%> And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H2620>take<s%> <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of Thy <S%H3671>wings.<s%>

They <S%H8248>drink<s%> their <S%H7301>fill<s%> of the <S%H1880>abundance<s%> of Thy <S%H1004>house;<s%> And Thou dost <S%H8248>give<s%> them to <S%H7301>drink<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%> of Thy <S%H5730>delights.<s%>
For with Thee is the <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of <S%H9132>life;<s%> In Thy <S%H216>light<s%> we <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H216>light.<s%>
O <S%H4900>continue<s%> Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> to those who <S%H3045>know<s%> Thee, And Thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> to the <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
Let not the <S%H7272>foot<s%> of <S%H1346>pride<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> upon me, And let not the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5110>drive<s%> me <S%H5110>away.<s%>

<S%H8033>There<s%> the <S%H6466>doers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%> have <S%H5307>fallen;<s%> They have been <S%H1760>thrust<s%> <S%H1760>down<s%> and <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H6965>rise.<s%>
